list.name: Scatter the Ashes
description: Toured the country, and some of Canada, and wrote and recorded music with this four piece post-hardcore band. Signed a development deal with Island records, releasing a full length LP on Epitaph records.

list.name: Mother/Father
description: Toured the country playing bass guitar, and wrote and recorded music with this four piece post-rock band. Produced and managed by Jacquire King (known for his work with Kings of Leon, Modest Mouse, Tom Waits, and more) and Jon Stinson. Released two EPs. Highlight show was opening for Kings of Leon and White Lies at the Sommet Center, and landing booking with CAA.

list.name: Future Unlimited
description: Toured the country, while writing and recorded songs, playing bass guitar and sometimes keyboards for this five piece rock/electronic band. Played festivals such as Bonaroo, Austin City Limits, Art Basel, and SXSW. Released two EPs and mulitple singles.

links.text: Listen to Future Unlimited on soundcloud

list.name: MCCORDINATOR
description: Mostly made in a bedroom home studio, these are recordings of personally written material. These songs helped me to learn how to record, write, and express myself individually through music.
